## Database Structure

Here's an overview of the main tables in our database:

| Table Name | Description | Primary Key | Records |
|------------|-------------|-------------|----------|
| Patients | Patient demographics | patient_id | 10,000 |
| Visits | Healthcare visits | visit_id | 50,000 |
| Diagnoses | Clinical diagnoses | diagnosis_id | 100,000 |
